column5: Has any one been to this loge and how is it and how is the fishing thinking about going there in June 2012 with my brother-inlaw from Florida. He has never been to Canada.Thanks for any information that is given.

Actually, I went there on a day trip this year. Todd's one of my favorite lodge owners. He and Jake run an awesome place. We just did Lake Trout fishing, and it was the best I've ever had. We caught several nice 22-28" lakers... it was a lot of fun! I really want to try Todd's musky lake...
I have known Todd since he was a kid and I know he will take care of you.
